articles.title: India's tiger population doubles in a decade offering key lessons - BBC.com
articles.description: India has more than 3,600 tigers – or 75% of the global tiger population despite high human density.
articles.content:
India is home to more than 3,600 tigers or 75% of the global tiger population
India now hosts the world's largest tiger population, despite having the highest human density and just 18% of global ti… [+5737 chars]

articles.title: A groom-to-be pilot, daughter of Indian immigrants and figure skating champions are among DC air collision victims - CNN
